title: learning champions in ranked
body:
I keep getting guys on my team who decide they want to learn a champion they have never played before... In ranked... Needless to say they feed tons and screw the whole team over as much as possible and 50% of the time they rage quit.

Am I the only one seeing this or does it happen a lot? And if you are one of these cats who thinks it's a good idea to learn a champion in ranked please tell me your thought process?
